pullRequest.title: Add configurations for challenge answer validation
pullRequest.bodyText:
PR Description
This feature supports the following functionalities,

Validate challenge question answers using a regex pattern - This will ensure the answer is according to the expected regex pattern.
Ensure the uniqueness of challenge question answers - This will ensure that more than one question hasn’t the same answer.

Follow the documentation of  “Managing Challenge Questions” on setting up challenge questions for user accounts.
To enable challenge question answer validation by management console.

Log in to the management console using admin credentials.
In the Identity section of the Main menu, click Resident under Identity Providers.
Navigate to Account Management Policies>Account Recovery.
Add the required challenge answer regex under the “Challenge question answer regex” field.
Enable “Enforce challenge question answer uniqueness” to validate the challenge answer uniqueness

The challenge question answer validation can be also enabled by adding the following configurations to deployment.toml file in “<IS_HOME>/repository/conf/” directory.
[identity_mgt.password_reset_challenge_questions]
answer_regex = “$answer_regex”
enforce_answer_uniqueness = true

Related PR: wso2-extensions/identity-governance#382
When should this PR to be merged
This PR should be merged prior to the wso2-extensions/identity-governance#382
